name: Pudding Pop Mobile
description:
Play Pudding pop! It’s an easy and fun puzzle game that anyone can play.

Over a million users has already played Pudding pop on Facebook and now it is available on iPhone and iPad!

Connect 3 or more of the same colored puddings to pop them. Score more points to collect as many flowers as possible. There are over 600 levels with various obstacles for you to enjoy.

If you are a new player, welcome to the fun world of Pudding pop! We hope you have a great time!
If you have already played Pudding pop on Facebook, thank you for all of your love and support!
